item.title: Build Run Container
item.description: Often I have a Dockerfile that describes the depenedencies of a piece of software. When doing development I want my code directory mounted into the container and the user properly set so I don’t get permissions problems when building inside the container. To solve this problem the below script builds an image based on the requested image or dockerfile and sets up a user and group in the container. Subsequent runs will look for an existing container by name to prevent rebuilding.
